I am currently based in NYC.

I am a Spring 2023 graduate from the George Washington University with a BS in Systems Engineering and a minor in Sustainability. I have a passion for problem solving, environmental stewardship, and shortening the gap between science and society.

I have expertise in conducting comprehensive research, programming for analytics, and exploratory data analysis, data forecasting and modeling.
